cont.entity_a: Router has frequent connectivity issues and requires constant supervision to restart.
cont.entity_b: Signal strength decreases with walls in between.

cont.entity_a: Customer service is unresponsive and unhelpful. Poor customer service and support.
Product is advertised for a service that is no longer provided.
Difficult to set up and configure, especially for VPN and remote access. Hardware is reliable but requires IT knowledge for setup. Setup issues with wireless and security modes.
cont.entity_b: Easy to set up but issues with DNS passthrough in shared mode.

cont.entity_a: Flawed wireless performance in mixed environments. Frequent crashes and instability, even with the latest firmware. Product lacks dual antennas, affecting multipath elimination.
cont.entity_b: Product performance is satisfactory but not for DSL use.

cont.entity_a: Firmware updates frequently needed but not always effective.
VPN feature does not work reliably.

cont.entity_b: Does not work with DSL and can overheat.
Good for travel and securing connections.
Difficult to configure WEP but WPA is easier.
Product died after a few months of use.
